name: Cube Miner 3.0
description: -----------------------Instructions-------------------------- -Arrow Keys or WASD to move -Space to Mine -Press B to look at your Book of Rocks -Earn Cash by mining Ores -If your game is lagging, press P to toggle particles off --------------------------------------------------------------- After tons of requests from you guys, I have decided to make Cube Miner 3! It retains all the aspects from the original game, as well as many new features! Current Record Holder is @coder_d6 with 2,017,512m! Current Cash Record Holder is @lhm5 with $4,905,469! ============NEW FEATURES============= ---- NEW MINING GEAR ---- *Drills *Cannons ---- 2 NEW BIOMES ---- *Core *THE END ---- AN EPIC FINAL BOSS BATTLE ---- ---- NEW COSTUMES ---- & ---- A TELEPORTATION ABILITY ---- *Once you get the Infinity Pickaxe =================================== -Music from Mega Man, Terraria, and Unitale
